name: qBittorrent
description: Ensures qBittorrent container and WebUI are reachable on port 8080.
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^qbittorrent$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start qbittorrent 2>/dev/null || docker restart qbittorrent 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 5; if curl -fs --max-time 5 http://localhost:8080 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'qBittorrent'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
